name: Stholen
description:
Play as a toy UFO in a sandbox, gobble up everything around you and become big enough to suck up the whole earth! 

 Stholen is a single player game, playable on keyboard and mouse

 CAN YOU ABSORD IT ALL ?

THE TEAM

Clément GARCIA / Jeremy FERREIRA

Julia BOFFIN / Clément COURTOIS

Manille BRUN / Loona PELACUER
